{name} appears to be performing as expected, compared to historical data.
There does not appear to be any drastic change for {name}.
negative: That's quite a drastic change for {name}, it normally does not perform this poorly ({likelihood}% likelihood compared to historical data). Asking me to fetch news on {name} could help explain the change.
{name} doesn't normally perform this poorly. The likelihood of the current performance is {likelihood}%. Ask me to fetch news on {name} to help gain some insight.
